chunks.text: Siddharth Suresh Location: Santa Clara Email: ssures23@ucsc.edu Phone: 661-857-2957 Summary
- Tech Lead with 7+ years bridging MLOps ,Classical ML , and Generative AI ; currently pursuing a Masters in NLP at UC Santa Cruz.
- Built and led Machine Learning teams at pre-seed and Series A startups, creating scalable systems handling millions of data points. Experience Seezo.io , Founding Engineer
- Architected the overall flow to automate design and code security reviews using Large Language models (LLMs).
- Built MLOps pipelines on a Supabase backend with custom Terraform deploy- ments.
- Implemented retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) pipelines with LlamaIndex for document-based Q&A on a Qdrant vector database.
- Created prompt engineering strategies with chain-of-thought prompting and multi- step hierarchical instructions forGPT-4 and Claude 3 .

- Developed internal tooling for benchmarking and versioning prompts, improving generation quality, logical consistency, and conversational flow.November 2023 - June 2024 Bengaluru WorkHack , Head of Tech I led a team of 8 engineers through 3 large scale(50K DAU) GenAI enterprise de- ployments. I architected and lead the following initiatives:
- Fine-tuned two in-house LLMs, based on Vicuna-13B and Llama-2-40B using LoRA and deployed on Amazon Bedrock. This reduced our dependency on Foundation Model APIs, cutting costs by 60%.
- Further reduced outbound LLM API calls by 15% by implementing a semantic cache stored on FAISS .
- Implemented Toolformer-inspired LLM agents to connect with external sources of truth, such as Google Maps, Wolfram Alpha, and Google Translate.
- Developed WorkHack Guardrails to detect and mitigate post-generation halluci- nations, later extending it to an on-prem PII masking solution.

- Devised a dynamic prompt chunking technique to mitigate Lost in the Middle, enabling the use of longer prompts (10k+ tokens) while preserving performanceMar 2023 - October 2024 Bengaluru Draup , Senior Data Scientist Led in-house LLM initiatives, developing a domain-specific model for job postings. Job Description(JD) LLM:
- Automated training dataset curation by fine-tuning a Siamese BERT on a Next Sentence Prediction task to extract relevant info from job postings.

- Optimized the RoBERTa model with ONNX -based distillation, reducing its size by 40% while preserving 98% of the original models accuracy through a teacher- student approach. Siddharth Suresh - Page 1 of 2Last updated in September 2024 Recruiter Profile Recommendation System:
- Architected the overall flow where we generated & indexed 850M+ Profile Embeddings onMilvus vector search to recommend similar candidates
- Optimized candidate selection by implementing Hierarchical Navigable Small World (HNSW) indexing, reducing inference time to under 3 seconds per million records.

- Enhanced candidate recommendations with a Dynamic Feature Weighting Algorithm that prioritized features based on recruiter preferences.Oct 2020 - March 2023 Bengaluru Chefling , Machine Learning Engineer (Founding team) Personalized Recipe Recommendation System:
- Built a Food Flavor Network by training recipe data on Word2Vec embeddings to identify similar flavor profiles for over 4,000 ingredients based on vector space proximity.
- Developed a Bi-LSTM-based Multi-Label Tagging System to categorize recipes by cuisine and tag them for dietary restrictions, supporting over 30 diet and allergen types.

- Addressed the cold start problem by applying Expectation-Maximization Clus- tering to group users with similar initial dietary preferences and demographics.Mar 2019 - Oct 2020 Bengaluru / SF WooHoo , SWE - 1 Machine Learning
- Developed an enterprise chatbot platform in Django, enabling on-premise deploy- ment with REST API integrations for data sources.
- Built a real-time intent classification system with XGBoost, enabling users to up- load sample utterances for on-cloud training.

- Designed multi-turn conversations with persistent context across sessions using Redis.Jan 2018 - Mar 2019 Bengaluru Education MS University of California, Santa Cruz , Natual Language Processing Sept 2024 - Dec 2025 (expected) BTech SRM University , Computer Science June 2012 - May 2017 Skills Large Language Models (LLM) -Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) -RNN -Pytorch -PySpark -Recommender Systems
- Conversational Agents -Python Siddharth Suresh - Page 2 of 2
